'''Cooking Ingredients''' are items that can be used to create [[Food]] through [[Cooking]]. They can be purchased at [[General Goods]] [[shop]]s, found in the wild, obtained through [[Processing]] of other items, found during [[Expedition]]s, or grown using [[Gardening]].

Many cooking ingredients are also [[Local Specialty|Local Specialties]].
